name: Double room - Guest House Ela
facilities: TV, Free WiFi, Balcony, Mini bar, Room service
description: Enjoying a peaceful location in Bansko, 500 metres from the cable car, Guest House Ela offers a sauna, steam bath and massages. Free WiFi is provided in the entire building.

name: Obzor Sea Holiday Apartament
facilities: TV, Climate System, Wi-Fi, Mini Bar, Balcony
description:
Featuring pool views, Obzor Sea Holiday Apartament provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar, around 1.3 km from Obzor Central Beach. This apartment has a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

The apartment features a terrace, 1 bedroom, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

The apartment offers a children's playground.
